                                           +----gjt.test.StopwatchTest
public class StopwatchTest
extends UnitTest
Unit test for the Stopwatch class. This unit test creates 3 LabelCanvases and 3 stopwatches. Each LabelCanvas selects and deselects at the rate of once per half second, once per second and once every two seconds. The selections and deselections are controlled by 3 stopwatches.

See Also:
UnitTest, Stopwatch, StopwatchClient
